interpretation:
Opener:	cannot open
	Denies long suit and weak points

hints.hint0:
0-5: Pass
5-11, 6+: len-4 (Weak)
Rule of 20: Suit
13-21: Suit
15-17: 1NT
22+: 2C (Strong)
hints.hint2:
<6 pts: Pass
<13 pts
	>=6 strong
		Two 4+ suit:pass
		(Len-4)L
Balanced
	15-17: 1NT
	Stop all suits
		18-19 hcp: 1L and jump NT
		20-21 hcp: 2NT
		25-27 hcp: 3NT
		28-29 hcp: 4NT
22+ pts: 2C
Rule of 20:
	Major 5+5: 1S
	Major 4+4: 1H
	Long major: 1L
	Minor 4+4: 1D
	Minor 3+3: 1C
	Long minor: 1L
